LanguageData.PlantSnowbeet.label: snow beet plant
LanguageData.PlantSnowbeet.description: A simple, highly nutritious plants. Grows well even in somewhat poor soil. Harvests quickly. A strong, versatile crop. Does not die in cold weather.
LanguageData.Planteggplant.label: eggplant plant
LanguageData.Planteggplant.description: Purple variety of the eggplant. Bitter when eaten raw.
LanguageData.Plantredlentil.label: red lentil plant
LanguageData.Plantredlentil.description: A redish variety of the lentil plant. One of the oldest know domesticated plants.
LanguageData.Plantpumpkin.label: pumpkin plant
LanguageData.Plantpumpkin.description: Large orange version of the squash plant. Often carved to ward off ghosts.
LanguageData.Plantsquash.label: squash plant
LanguageData.Plantsquash.description: Yellow variety of the squash family.
LanguageData.Plantbean.label: bean plant
LanguageData.Plantbean.description: Common bean cooked up in many ways.
LanguageData.PlantTomato.label: tomato vine
LanguageData.PlantTomato.description: Distinctive red fruit that grows best in rich soil.
LanguageData.PlantCarrot.label: carrot plant
LanguageData.PlantCarrot.description: A long orange vegetable that can be tricky to grow.
LanguageData.Plantmushroom.label: Mushroom Plant
LanguageData.Plantmushroom.description: This robust mushroom has been genetically engineered and cultivated to produce a filling meat substitute.
LanguageData.Plantoats.label: oats plant
LanguageData.Plantwheat.label: wheat plant
LanguageData.Plantwheat.description: Wheat is a cereal grain, can be milled into flour.
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.label: cocoa plant
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.description: Cocoa beans are refined into chocolate.
LanguageData.Plantsugarcane.label: sugarcane plant
LanguageData.PlantTea.label: tea plant
LanguageData.PlantTea.description: A green leafy plant, who's leaves can be brewed into a tasty beverage.
LanguageData.PlantCoffee.label: coffee plant
LanguageData.PlantCoffee.description: A green, leafy plant yielding coffee beans. These beans can be brewed into a tasty beverage.
LanguageData.PlantFlax.label: flax flower
LanguageData.PlantFlax.description: A flower thats fibers are use to spin into cloth.
LanguageData.PlantNeutroFlower.label: Neutro Flower
LanguageData.PlantNeutroFlower.description: A beautiful Yellow-Orange Flower. Used to make Neutroamine, a medicine base.
LanguageData.Plantbamboo.label: bamboo plant
